body_text:
The automated linting for recipe-client-addon aren't linting code properly according to the mozilla-central eslint rules. For example, https://github.com/mozilla/normandy/blob/master/recipe-client-addon/test/browser/browser_NormandyDriver.js#L11 has spaces between the curly braces and the contents, which isn't allowed by mozilla-central standards. That file also uses single quotes for strings, which also isn't allowed by mozilla-central linting.
A while ago @mythmon told me to add a .eslintignore file to the root of my repo, and add a file at tools/lint/eslint/modules.json to deal with a bug with the mozilla-central eslint plugin, which may be why my editor picks up on these linting errors, but our automation doesn't. We should figure out why those are necessary, and see if we can patch the issue in their eslint plugin to fix our own linting.
